Definition.WordDefinition: lay over v 1: interrupt a journey temporarily, e.g., overnight; "We had to stop over in Venezuela on our flight back from Brazil" [syn: {stop over}] 2: place on top of; "can you superimpose the two images?" [syn: {superimpose}, {superpose}]
layover n : a brief stay in the course of a journey; "they made a stopover to visit their friends" [syn: {stop}, {stopover}]
